events.message: I recently purchased a jacket but realized I need to return it because it doesn’t fit properly. How do I get a refund for my order?
The issue has been identified as a refund request related to a recent purchase return inquiry.
Your refund case has been assigned to one of our customer support agents for further assistance.
Hello! I’m here to help you with your refund request for the jacket. Could you please provide your order number?
To process your refund efficiently, we need the order number and reason for the return. Could you please share those details?
Sure, the order number is 1234567890. I want to return the jacket because it is too small and doesn’t fit me correctly.
Thank you for the info. We will initiate your refund as soon as we receive the returned jacket. Please use our prepaid return shipping label sent to your email.
Thanks for the quick response and clear instructions. I will send the jacket back today and appreciate your assistance.
We have received your returned jacket and processed the refund. The amount should reflect on your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and everything is satisfactory with your return process.
We are closing this refund case now. Please feel free to contact us if you need any further assistance in the future.
